name: Aloe Vera
details: A low-maintenance succulent known for its healing properties.

name: Spider Plant
details: A resilient plant that produces baby plants along its stems.

name: Peace Lily
details: A flowering plant that purifies air and thrives in low light.

name: Snake Plant
details: A hardy plant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering.

name: ZZ Plant
details: An easy-care plant with thick, waxy leaves that stores water.

name: Jade Plant
details: A succulent plant that symbolizes luck and prosperity.

name: English Ivy
details: A climbing plant known for its air-purifying abilities.

name: Boston Fern
details: A humidity-loving plant with feathery fronds.

name: Pothos
details: A trailing plant that’s nearly impossible to kill.

name: Chinese Money Plant
details: A compact plant with coin-shaped leaves that’s easy to care for.

name: Bamboo Palm
details: A tropical plant that thrives in humidity and low light.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
details: A popular plant with large, violin-shaped leaves.

name: Rubber Plant
details: A low-maintenance plant with dark, glossy leaves.

name: Philodendron
details: A versatile plant that adapts well to indoor environments.

name: Lucky Bamboo
details: An easy-to-grow plant often associated with good fortune.
